attributes.review: I downloaded the app and couldn’t use it at all. I just wanted to know when the next rally was gonna be near me because I have been going to everyone I can. Lately I have had random problems come up where after I register for my tickets I end up having to walk my pet sprite bottle during the rally. It’s just not fair. How can Cheetos make America great when they won’t let me join in on the fun
attributes.title: So glitchy and not helpful

attributes.review: I am very upset with the content found on the app. Everything is seems to be biased towards the benefit of the racist, homophobic pig that is in. It is honestly very ironic that the person who always calls the news and actual facts “fake” is the same person who feeds lies and actual fake news to the people who are easily manipulated and in basically all cases uneducated. Overall terrible app with terrible content and extremely terrible purpose :(
attributes.title: FAKEEEEE APP

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see what our fellow Cheeto puff is doing. When I open the app, the screen flashes Trump’s naked photo! It was so disgusting and I HATED it! But I was really invested so I opened the app again. When I opened the app my mom SCREAMED at me to come look and I found ORANGE NAKED RATS in my basement! Now when I closed the app, they disappeared! I never want anything to remind me of Trump. Because he’s a ORANGE 🍊 RACIST 👨🏾‍🦱 HOMOPHOBIC 🏳️‍🌈 RAT 🐀 I also almost got a headache from how ORANGE he is! Like seriously! Oranges 🍊 are QUAKING! They’re JEALOUS.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤮🤢

attributes.review: I was sexually harassed by DONALD J TRUMP AT HIS RALLY. He told remove my clothing and to sexually dance for him. 😾I have never felt more unsafe in my life. 😢He then proceeded to ask me if I would watch him get a spray tan. I immediately responded with “No ❤️”. He thought I was flirting cause I put a heart but...he wouldn’t understand. I WAS ALSO ON TIKTOK AND DONALD TRUMPS FANS STARTED TO BULLY ME AND CALLING ME NIG NOG, AFRICAN BOOTY SCATCHER, JIGGABOO, AND SO MANY OTHER SLURS. 😿I am now attending life long therapy because of this verbal abuse. My friend also said that she was assaulted by a trump fan after saying “#settleforbiden”.
attributes.title: HE CALLED ME NIG NOG!😾

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and expected something cool but instead I saw something... horrible!!! Disgusting 😳 OUTRAGEOUS 😤 It was the awful ugly Cheeto man and I swear to you after I downloaded this app my phone started acting buggy and glitchy 😳 Not a very good app, honestly the worst. Such a disgusting and disturbing app especially with that horrid ugly Cheeto man. I would rate this app 0 out 5 stars. But sadly I can only 1 star. Quite unfortunate but it would have to do 😔
attributes.title: 😔 Disappointing and disgusting

attributes.review:
Wanted this app to learn more ab the orange in the White House 🥵🤤🍊🍊 but became very concerned when I got the sudden urge to hit on my daughter. 🤭🤯 👧🏼👧🏼 pedo alert! 🥳💫
I pretty sure this app possessed me 😯but I’m still not sure. Soo if you don’t wanna be possessed do not get this app. Also to note that his nudes will appear on your wall and multiply by the day. Confusing lack of penis.  I only got rid of them by deleting the app but now I constantly see Trumps ✨mangina ✨in my mind even after. DO NOT GET THIS APP! ❤️
attributes.title: 🅱️AD 🅰️PP!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app for political reasons then went to go walk my pet fish. When I opened it I saw this ORANGE- CHEETO LOOKING MONSTER! my 81 moth old got terrified and couldn’t sleep for 49 years. After a month or so, I started to forget but then I realized I got all my personal information LEAKED ONTO THE DARK WEB! I had to change everything about me after. Even my age. Currently I’m a 27 year old white male who was born in Alabama. Don’t recommend at all. Don’t get it if u want to live in peace.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: this app is so glitchy and when i opened i saw an ugly orange man on my screen, now i think my phone is broken. i hate this app . whoever designed it did a horrible job. 🙉🙉 hopefully it’s gets deleted before everyone’s phone goes crazy. it also showed photos of a naked baby which is very disturbing . it gave a my phone a horrible virus 🦠 and now it barley works! this man is so ugly 🦄💖💝🤍 who let him be president?! 🔓🔒 gross 🤢 🤮 💔 DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! 🌷🌺🍂🌝🍃🍃🌼🌼🍃🌛🌞🍂🌕🍂🌛🌜🌼
attributes.title: it’s horrible

attributes.review: this app is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded in my entire existence! it has terrible news and it insulted me the first time i opened it. it also tracked me down, took my dog, beat her, stabbed my grandmother in the chest, stole my purse, ate it, and then proceeded to puke it up in my living room. this app is terrible and i absolutely do not recommend it for anyone and all of you should rate it a 1 star!!! i would have rated it lower if i could. do not vote trump 2020 he’s disgusting
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY NO

attributes.review: This app was so disrespectful. As soon as I opened it my screen went blank and read “all lives matter” . This made my phone glitch and bug out. Lord just give this manz app a one star god dam
